website_summaries.verdict: If your family has broken other mats, this is the one for you. It was tested and supported the front wheels of an SUV.
pros: Vented, slatted design allows for faster drying and good airflow
Ventilate regularly and clean dirt from slats
Do not clean with strong solvents
cons: Gaskets are tall, which can cause mat to shift if you step near the edges

customer_reviews.title: Really Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: The tiling in my bathroom has been removed in preparation for new floor covering. I bought these to put down on my bath floor as temporary covering solution prior to the bathroom remodel. These look great, feel great. I was a little worried based on other reviews about them being slippery, so I purchased some clear bath treads non slip stickers just in case. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Gets Moldy
customer_reviews.text: I purchases this for my shower bench so that I didn’t feel like I was sitting in water. This worked out pretty good. The problem is that it gets moldy and requires regular cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: KayLJ

customer_reviews.title: Useful for outdoor foot shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my outdoor foot-shower station. I live near the beach and I have stone driveway. I wanted a comfortable way for people to rinse their feet off when they returned from the beach as the sand is very fine and really sticks. I bought this bamboo mat hoping that people would actually use and stand on it to rinse their feet. I have tenants in the house for about 5 weeks. I just returned to the cottage and this mat has held up well for nearly two months. Looks brand new and has been outside all that time. It works well for the use I had in mind and has held up outdoors, 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: azreads

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tiny aparment bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect for my tiny Brooklyn apartment. It is small but essentially takes up the entire bathroom floor. I like it because it does not get gross like textile-based bath mats. It is easy to wipe down and looks clean. If feet germs gross you out, this is the mat for you!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anne White

customer_reviews.title: ...revise adhesive...
customer_reviews.text: it was great until it fell apart 3 months later. 2 of the top boards came loo.se
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it get wet
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid pieceof "shower mat". We use it in our RV in the wet bath, however remove it when we take a shower. This is probably not a piece that should get wet too often (without being dried right after), or mold will spring up. It can easily withhold the weight of an average sized adult. Has four little rubber feet too. Nice platform, enhances the look of the RV bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. So durable in fact my almost 300 pound self can use it. It will slide around though in the shower. It would be worth using some kind of traction on sealed tile. I plan on getting another one and using it in my kitchen to stand on while cooking. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: an elegant feeding station for the fur babies
customer_reviews.text: A glass desk blotter over this bath mat makes a solid dining table. I think it would work well as a step-out bathroom mat for humans as well, but wanted to share that it has many other potential uses.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s soft to step on and feels like I’m in a spa or sauna. I was worried about it slipping but it doesn’t at all. We haven’t had a problem with water underneath either which is another thing I was worried about. Definitely prefer stepping on this rather than a rug that gets soaked after stepping out onto it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Genius Idea for a Mat!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and the water just beads right off! It doesn’t get cold and surprisingly comfortable so sitting on it during showers is a warm pleasure. Wish I’d stumbled across this bamboo mat sooner, great find and buy.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carpeted bathrooms.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bathroom that someone put carpet in (really bad idea). I tried using a traditional bath mat, but it moved around on the carpet. So I opted to try this wood mat. It stays put nicely, and I just put a handtowel over the top to catch water drops that might fall on it, which helps keep water of the carpet too. It has a low profile, and rubber feet, very nicely made. Can't wait to see how it will work without carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great bamboo mat for bath!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about durability yet. Just got it. It arrived in perfect condition, is a good size, simple to dry & clean. I recommend the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and beautiful. I love the way the air flows under me after a shower. No more standing in a wet or dirty shaggy rug or feeling cold on memory foam. Guests always comment on it when they visit. I got this one bc of the size. Some places try to get you to order a small square. This is the perfect size for a average sized person. I’m 5’7 150 lbs female.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than a Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best alternative to a typical bath mat. It holds firm to the ground and doesn’t slip when it’s wet. If you come out of the shower wet, you also don’t have to worry about slipping. It is so easy to clean and looks so much better and modern in a bathroom than a mat. Please do not consider a squishy, dirty water soaking mat again. Get this instead, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to stand on, great for under a standup bath
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these to help raise up a standup bath in my center drain shower, and for that they're perfect. However when I do actually shower, they're a bit fiddly to stand on. One is too small for me and two is awkward as I end up stepping where they meet. It's also very weird feeling under my feet regardless of if I stand with my feet perpendicular or parallel to them. However it looks nice, is good for the bath, and stays still when I do stand on it in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Sabino

customer_reviews.title: Time to get Rid of the Rug
customer_reviews.text: Clearly this is what I needed all along! It’s sturdy. Easy to clean. No more continuous washing of the rugs. It looks good in my bathroom. And it was a great price considering I’ve been seeing these sold at other places & they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: The Corie Diaries

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wood - 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: This wooden shower mat fit perfectly in our Palomino camper bathroom floor. Small in size, big on quality. Water beads up, the color is lovely and it is very sturdy. My hubby is a larger sized man and it works well for him. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Denise H

customer_reviews.title: Minimal look for a modern bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Our dog kept tracking too much of his fur (husky life) onto the bathroom mats, so we decided to get rid of the mats altogether so that our robot vacuum can enter the bathroom and clean. We bought this to place right outside the bath tub and it's been perfect at offering texture and support when we step out of the shower. It's also the perfect size for one person to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Shower Mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the RV shower floor. Fits and looks good. Appears to be very well made and the finish is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than a standard bathmat for us. We keep out cat's litter box in our bathroom, and this makes it so much easier to clean up stray litter on the floor. Easy to clean, non-slip and looks really nice. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I would actually like this to step on when getting out of the shower bought it more for decorating the bathroom BUT we all absolutely love this mat... its soft in the feet and not slippery at all! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep dog pee off of bath mats
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much!! I got this because my dog always pees on our bath mats and I saw a viedo of someone recommending getting this to put on top of it and it works perfectly and looks very good as well! It also dose not hurt your feet when you step on it and drys very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cerullo

customer_reviews.title: Good for cat homes
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but it doesn’t dry your feet. That’s it’s one downfall. However it keeps me from stepping in cat litter
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to poolside shower, feels comfortable and not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: LinN

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Mat
customer_reviews.text: The "mat" is not what I expected. Very thick, heavy and essentially a permanent mat. I wanted a thinner foldable mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jane C. Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but a little small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat, I wish it were a bit bigger (lengthwise) so it wouldn’t slide while I’m in the shower, or when I have to get to the opposite side of the tub, otherwise it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Cape

customer_reviews.title: Effective, well-made and safe...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the wooden shower mat. I was a bit reluctant at first because the mat was cheaper than many other bamboo mats online. So far - the mat has been easy to clean, looks sturdy, and does not slip even when you step on it heavily, on a wet floor. I'm buying a second one for my second bathroom...
customer_reviews.author: STRath

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our bathroom and is very comfy on the feet because of the wide boards. The rubber feet help keep it firmly in place. Quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Stays put but skeptical about durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my big household and my parents were a little skeptical about standing on it and it not slipping out from underneath them but even they were suprised at how sturdy it was. I was a little disappointed though when you stand on it between the "support" slats and it makes a cracking sound so everyone is afraid to stand on it anywhere but the very middle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but worth every penny! I put this on top of my tub it makes a little shelf and looks very classy! Happy!
customer_reviews.author: leila

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Looks good and is exactly what I hoped. Although I have found that a regular bath mat is a little more comfortable to step out onto, the ease of cleaning this is much better than the mat. Drying the water from underneath the go beam is a little bit of a hassle, but not as much as washing a regular bath mat in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item is great except that I'm not sure how to use it. I have wood laminate floors in my bathroom. Should I put a mat underneath the bamboo mat to absorb the water that slips through the bamboo slats? Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting out of the shower...I still use a bathmat under it..but now my bathmat doesn't get soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beatifull and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Add a small rag under and this is a very polish matt, it has very good rubber feet i am 138 punds no squiky sound at all is small like i wanted for my busy bathroom love it.
customer_reviews.author: maria mahr

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this in our camper shower. The quality is outstanding. Absolutely smooth finish, no rough edges. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bath mat. Looks really nice in our remodelled bathroom. Does require occasional airing out and cleaning to keep mould away, but that is to be expected with anything that is around so much moisture- takes a little effort but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Neat addition to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love this simple design that still gives a spa look in my bathroom. It is so much easier to clean than regular bathroom floor towels. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Heal cracked and dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Great for prevent clasis dead skin and dryness under my feet using in the shower. Great for mat out of the shower no molding or mildew unlike traditional mats causes feet skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: adventuregal

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it is a very good product. I was looking for a small matt and this fit perfectly in my bathroom. I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s weird, but I have actually gotten compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Nicest looking (and lowest maintenance) shower mat I have ever owned... also environmentally friendly! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but nice
customer_reviews.text: I think it is pricy but the product actually exceeds my expectation. All the surface is smooth and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ronana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had it for too long but it looks great outside of our tub and feels sturdy! Great for bathrooms that share a space with a litter box too... no more kitty litter getting stuck in the bath mat!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis DuPristle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! Easy to keep clean. I bought a fabric dish drying cloth from Walmart and I put it underneath the wood in case my son gets too much water on the wood mat. It seems though I may not need the cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian@Organized Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Slippery little bugger
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute but was really slippery when getting out of the shower. No longer using.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is nice about this. Adds a different look to my bathroom also very comfortable for when getting out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sadaf Osmani

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely so happy with this mat. Our regular bathtub rug would never dry and I hated stepping on it since it was always damp. However, this little wooden gem allows air to flow and things to dry. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Clean Looking
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for quite a while now and it's still holding up great. Some of the paint/stain got scraped off by the bottom of a door rubbing on it, but it still feels nice and smooth. Works a lot nicer than a bath mat or a towel and looks a whole nice better.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Cocco

customer_reviews.title: Non slippery
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was longer in width and more flat to the floor. I’m constantly stubbing my toe. Other than that I love it and it looks nicer than the nasty rug I had before
customer_reviews.author: Ashley.O

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven’t used it yet, it looks like it is a great solution for our outdoor shower on our travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Altojan

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured. Ugly logo.
customer_reviews.text: Has a ugly logo on it that is not pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha McKinley-Yunker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works like it is supposed to and looks good sitting on our tile floor outside the shower, now no more slipping on the floor when we step out.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for damp bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: My tiny apartment bathroom has horrible ventilation and my old bath mats never seemed to dry all the way. This is a perfect substitute. It dries quickly and won’t trap smells and cooties like a fabric mat.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of bath mats made of memory foam or fabric because they need to be machine washed regularly to avoid bad odor. This bamboo mat arrived in perfect condition and is so easy to clean. It instantly upgraded my bathroom aesthetic. I'm not sure how it would function in a constantly damp or humid environment like a sauna, but I'd say it's perfect to place in front of your shower or tub.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OUSTANDING AND NOT AS HEAVY AS THE OUTHER BAMBOO MAT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kolomona

customer_reviews.title: Reliable bamboo bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to: it stays in place and it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: shama346

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Perfect for my rv's wetbath!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is much better quality than expected. The finish is silky smooth! I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa McCormick-Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. perfect size and great quality for stepping out of the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Amy George

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bathroom Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I wanted! Size and description were accurate.

customer_reviews.title: much better than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to tell from the pictures but these are substantial and solid. And the spacing between the slats is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maintain. Love how it looks in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: ebony

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Read some bad reviews on this but got it anyways and glad I did! Granted I just got it today, it looks well made and durable to use. Love the look in our bathroom. Wanted to steer away from having that mildew smell w bath mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the overall look and feel of the item. It is smooth, but obviously it’s not as soft as a normal bath mat. Great purchase if you’re looking to spruce up a bathroom without the bland looking mats.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barber

customer_reviews.title: Non skid and not slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love this bamboo bath mat. My floors are never wet after a shower and I found this mat to be very stable on my tiled bathroom floor and do not find it slippery in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Collelo

customer_reviews.title: Clean and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for stepping out of the shower. Eliminates the soggy bath mat feel.
customer_reviews.author: PA mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I was a little concern that my fiance may not do so well on it; but all is still good. Daily use and standing up to the challange; therefore no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received these bamboo mats. They add a nice modern touch to the bathrooms. Haven't used them yet. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo slates are very smooth and feel comfortable underfoot. I also have a small bathroom and needed a stall size mat to fit; this one fits perfectly. I've used other slated wood mats before, but this is the most comfortable one I've used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, dries fast and doesn’t slide. Makes the bathroom look more elegant than a regular bath rug.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy this bamboo shower mat. i haven't had one like this before but i don't think i'll go back to the cloth options that are out there anytime soon. good product
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our tiled shower seating area
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our tiled shower seating area; so much nicer to sit on this compared to the not-always-100%-clean tiles!
customer_reviews.author: Winecharmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my bathroom. Gives it a spa feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I bought this to replace a smelly bath mat. Good quality, lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to replace the blanket. This is easy to clean and would not contain any invisible dirts. The size also matches our tiny bath room. Really like it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Smallish
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than appears but great for compact bathrooms. See measurements. No assembly!
customer_reviews.author: selena yancho

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it worked well for the outdoor shower timing about getting it for the inside showers
customer_reviews.author: carolmagera

customer_reviews.title: No mold
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It stays put, does not get mold, and is comfortable to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Becker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it will do. It's sturdy, repels water and looks great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: nnalence

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks fabulous in our bathroom and happy to not have wet rugs anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works for what it is, does not get mildew which is good
customer_reviews.author: John McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I just use it and I can say not once have I slipped like I did with the normal bathroom mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great bath mat, a more hygienic alternative to a fabric one. Seems very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and functions well. We use it with a towel so it can dry better.
customer_reviews.author: Min Park

customer_reviews.title: feels nice underfoot, doesn't crack from months of living in ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, feels nice underfoot, doesn't crack from months of living in my disgustingly humid/poorly vented bathroom. What else...do you really need here?
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical rug.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a typical bathroom rug. I wanted something new and got this. It is just what I wanted for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: I got the biggest size of bamboo mat and I love it so much. study, simple and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: djl

customer_reviews.title: Great change up from your typical bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few weeks ago to go along with some other items for my bathroom; was wary at first but all of my concerns have been alleviated! No slips, just a great new look. After using this product I honestly believe that all of my old memory foam mats were more of a slip concern. Have gotten several compliments and am loving the "spa-like feel" it has given my bathroom. I was going to go with a smaller sized different brand because I thought it might overpower my bathroom; so glad I didn't! Buy this; you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. it was just what I was expecting and I think it is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda m.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo bathmat was received quickly and without damage. I love the sleek, beauty of it. Perfect size for our bathroom. Nothing not to love!
customer_reviews.author: shaye troha

customer_reviews.title: Solid Cute Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in place of a cloth shower mat. It's been working well so far! No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Justina Lee

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size for my bathroom. It doesn’t slide on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality-works perfect for what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go outside for the outdoor shower to rinse off after swimming. Great quality and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Proud to Show Off My Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathroom mat to church up my bathroom. I'm not in college anymore and work a full-time, 50+ hour per week job. I didn't think it was acceptable to have a batthroom that gave the impression that I still mainline 30 racks of Natural Light. This mat, along with a couple of other items I picked up, really ties the room together. It came fully assembled, which was really nice. I've spent most of my day putting together other furniture that I ordered thru black Friday deals. It came boxed within two separate boxes, included bubble wrap, and presented itself undamaged. For $30, you can't really ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, but wish it didn’t have brand logo so obvious
customer_reviews.text: Solid bath mat that’s sturdy and doesn’t slip. The wood also has some solid weight to it. I wish it didn’t have the logo engraved into the corner
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Choi

customer_reviews.title: Grip could be better
customer_reviews.text: Using 3 of these for shower. Pros: - Look nice. - Very soft to the touch. Cons: - Slide on the tiles, grip not too great. - Bend when you stand on them (I’m 150 lbs). Could have more support from underneath. - Water stays on them. Too much effort to put them up each time. If they last long, then ok, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Asta

customer_reviews.title: No more cats peeing where I stand when getting out of the shower! Also a really good quality mat.
customer_reviews.text: Our cats have never let us have a single mat for coming out of the shower without peeing all over it. We've tried other bamboo mats, rugs, non ruber-backed rugs, everything. Until this came along I thought it was a lost cause. I found someone on a forum recommending this mat, and lo and behold, 6 months and no attention paid to it by our cats! Success! The one drawback is that it is a bit smaller than our old mats, but that's not a fault of the product as it states the dimensions right in the description. The construction is good and sturdy, haven't had any sort of slippage of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I bought it as a laptop tray for my bathtub since it's the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Real nice quality. Not too big, not too small. A BIT expensive but it's the one I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: George Francis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good except rubber feet are too tall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good except rubber feet are too tall. If you step on the front edge, the mat risks flipping up and you may lose balance. Other than this, the material and finish seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: Good Mat for my situation. I was needed a right size for my shower
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom doesn’t have windows or insulation. I was buying new bath mats every couple of months because they would start to stink/rot. This was the best solution. It’s much nicer looking than any bath mat and it absolutely does not slip or move. The quality is great and sturdy. I will never go back to regular mats again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty And the right size
customer_reviews.text: I got the smal one. It's very pretty And the right size, but every time I step on it it flips up and makes a loud slam on the floor, not what my downstairs neighbors enjoy. It needs to be weighted down a little more
customer_reviews.author: Kat

product_meta.title: GOBAM Shower Mat Bath Mat for Spa Relaxation,Bathroom Rugs,Non-Slip for Indoor or Outdoor,Bamboo (19.7 x 13 x 1.3 inches)
feature_bullets: ★ Anti-Slip Bamboo Mat used for shower, spa, sauna, bathroom, kitchen, even outdoor.
★ BEAUTIFULLY SLEEK SURFACE: The bath mat surface is finely finished by three times coating, water-resistant, very smooth, comfortable for touch.
★ SPECIAL DESIGN: 5 wide slats on the surface,Vented design for drying faster and ensures a quick flow of air and water, 9 anti-slip gaskets on the bottom, keep the mat firmly in the place.
★ EXTREME TESTING: We have made load-bearing test, the front wheel of 2-ton SUV pressed across the mat, No break happened, so, do not worry about bath mat bear capacity.
